short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep https://www.coingecko.com/account/candy open and have your CoinGecko candy automatically collected

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep https://www.coingecko.com/account/candy open and have your CoinGecko candy automatically collected.

Icon notices if the tab is closed and indicates issues. Click to open it in a new tab, or bring the tab to the front.

Open source: https://github.com/Ondkloss/cg-candy-collector
